title: 6/7/17 - Rethinking War On Terror
description:
Mike Broomhead in for Glenn Beck ...Background information on the NSA document leaker ...How Obamacare is falling apart ...Kal Elsebai gives his Muslim perspective on the spike in Ramadan violence and the difference between Sunni Shiite ...British Prime Minister Theresa May says the UK will change human rights laws if needed for terror fight ...Media salivate over the upcoming Comey testimony ...There is so much hypocrisy on both sides of the isle ...Waiting on the Supreme Court to decide on President Trump's travel ban ...The most troubling tweets from alleged FBI leaker Reality Winner? Vote now at glennbeck.com ..Reality Winner's parents speak ...Trump picks his new FBI Director. Who is Christopher Wray? ...Rare: ISIS terror attacks hit Iran ...Rand Paul still railing for Obamacare repeal ...Jeff Sessions offers his resignation? ...Kim Kardashian put on blast over gun control.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
